title: DNS flood
extract: DNS flood is a type of Distributed Denial of Service (DDoS) attack in which the attacker targets one or more Domain Name System (DNS) servers belonging to a given zone, attempting to hamper resolution of resource records of that zone and its sub-zones.
extract_html: DNS flood is a type of Distributed Denial of Service (DDoS) attack in which the attacker targets one or more Domain Name System (DNS) servers belonging to a given zone, attempting to hamper resolution of resource records of that zone and its sub-zones.
